txt.en: Faced with a mighty beast, you are inspired to do great things!
'The light has no place here!  Leave now!'
With a howl, the king removes any inspiration you may have had.
With a piercing scream, the Morroval corrupts the great mirror before her
As Ergoth is weakened, a chest crumbles to dust.
Once the Warg King is defeated, you can use this chest.
Once Ergoth is killed, you may use this chest.
